topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/554135186368725897bd0a00#post_554135186368725897bd0a00
who is this precious Dino? And where can I get one?
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/554135f76368725897e50b00#post_554135f76368725897e50b00
That is Diego Brando. One of the racers in Jojo's Bizarre Adventure Part 7: Steel Ball Run. 
[spoiler]He got hit with the stand Scary Monster which turns everyone it hits into mind-controlled dinosaurs. After Scary Monster's defeat he kept the ability to transform between human ad dinosaur form. And notice the name _Dio_ is all over his body.[/spoiler]
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff
